title: ‘North-East Humanitarian Operations medals awarded
content: ‘North-East humanitarian operation’ medals were conferred today (Dec 14), upon personnel of armed services and police including civilians- who had directly engaged in humanitarian assistance programmes, in the quest of liberating North and East from a three decade prolonged terrorist tyranny. H.E the President and C-in-C Mahinda Rajapaksa graced the inauguration ceremony of the national…
